title: Completed PE Summary - Island Gem/Bro Traveller
raw_html:
Vessel name Bro Traveller
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Brostom Ship Management AB
Port of registry: Gotenborg
Flag: Sweden
Type: Tanker
Built: 1988
Classification society: Lloyds Register
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 143.
Gross tonnage: 7973.00
Date & Time 07/03/05 13:41
Location of incident: Coastal waters
Incident Type: Collision
Persons onboard: Details
Injuries/ fatalities: 13
Damage/ Pollution: Material Damage/No Pollution

Vessel name Island Gem
Category Merchant
Registered Owner & Manager: Siomar Enterprises Ltd
Port of registry: Piraeus
Flag: Greece
Type: Dry Cargo/Bulk carrier
Built: 1984
Classification society: American Bureau
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 178.21
Gross tonnage: 17065.00
Date & Time 07/03/05 13:41
Persons onboard: 19 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Material damage

Synopsis

The bulk carrier Island Gem was in collision with the anchored tanker Bro Traveller whilst moving from her anchored position to the pilot pick-up point in the Bristol Channel

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector wrote to the managers of Island Gem regarding passage planning and bridge resource management.
